item.description:
On January 6th, 2010, join the NEREIA group and welcome in the new year with a whole new attitude...

NEREIA is incredibly excited and eager to welcome James Goddard this coming meeting. After becoming familiar with the teachings of influential leaders such as Rhonda Byrne, Colin Powell, Eckhart Tolle, etc. James Goddard decided to put things into action. Jim changed his mindset, and was able to achieve amazing success in both his personal and business life because of it.

His book, "Freedom for a Day" teaches you how to remove your limitations for 24 hours, gain a fresh new perspective on the world around us, and soar to new potential with powerful tools to help you stay in control of your thoughts and therefore, your life.

You don't want to miss this event! Jim is coming to share his secrets with us, and the best way to ring in the new year is with a new, positive outlook for the year to come! See you there!

YOU WILL LEARN:

* Which Social Medias you need to be a part of.
* The low/no cost way to increase your sales.
* Ways to take control of your market with little time and investment.
* Why the next generation of REALTORS will make more and work less.
* How to use the system you have used, and integrate it with Social Media.
* To have the internet do your work for you.
* How to market yourself while you do the things you enjoy in life.

The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824

When: Wednesday, January 6th, 2010, 6:30-10:00 PM

Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
NEREIA and Associated REIA Members: FREE

Ask about getting YOUR membership today!
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association January Meetup
